amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Community Development Block Grant by $100 million and to reduce funding for the Home Investment Partnerships Program by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the Community Development Fund by $100 million and to reduce funding for the Home Investment Partnerships Program by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capito amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 114 - 311 (Roll no. 278).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Capito amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 114 - 311 (Roll no. 278).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mrs. Capito.
